descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Avery Bradley sends a long pass to Andre Drummond who rises up for a strong two-handed slam in the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Bradley, Drummond connect for alley-oop dunk) 2018/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bradley, Drummond connect for alley-oop dunk

videos.description: Tobias Harris scores 14-points in the first quarter against the Nets including a couple of nice triples.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Harris' exploding first quarter) 2018/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harris' exploding first quarter

videos.description: Spencer Dinwiddie hustles past Pistons defenders and finishes with a tough two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Dinwiddie soars for the flush) 2018/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dinwiddie soars for the flush

videos.description: Luke Kennard intercepts Caris LeVert ugly pass and goes coast-to-coast for an easy two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Kennard breaks away for the jam) 2018/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kennard breaks away for the jam
